trophies.trophyDetail: Keep playing hard, and earn a score of at least 150 million on any table!
Flex your muscles and show off your pinball skills by earning 2000 Pro Score!
Get your friends together and earn 10000 Team Score!
Discover your collection, and play on at least 4 different tables!
Perform a successful bang back with the Captain America ball. Perform a bang back by nudging the table at the right time as the ball heads down an outlane.
Assemble the Avengers and start the Wizard mode against Loki and his army.
Ride the surfboard with the Silver Surfer, and score a Surfer Award on Infinity Gauntlet.
Beat Thanos, and possess the Infinity Gauntlet to rule the Infinity Gems on Infinity Gauntlet.
Collect all targets before the walker destroys them during Blitzkrieg USA on the Fear Itself  table!
Beat all of the Worthy and Skadi to confront the Serpent on the Fear Itself table!
Enter Hulk's Arena on the World War Hulk table!
Complete all the Main and Side missions on the World War Hulk table!
Max out your funds by recovering treasures and vampire stashes on Blade.
Complete all stages of the Final Mission and defeat Dracula on Blade.
Find Adamantium and complete a successful bonding process on the Wolverine table!
Engage Sabretooth in battle and defeat him on the Wolverine table!
Complete all Tony Stark missions on Iron Man table!
Complete the Whiplash and Mandarin missions on Iron Man table!
You can get this Trophy when a pumpkin bomb ball explodes in one of Doctor Octopus' tentacles on Spider-Man table.
Complete all four stages and lock three balls into Doc Ock hole to start the Wizard Mode: Clone Chaos on Spider-Man table!
Clear the way to the Cosmic Cube and grab it for a wish on the Captain America table.
Complete each mission from Cap and the Red Skull, find at least one of the Howlers, and defeat the Red Skull in a series of battles in the Final Clash on the Captain America table!
Take off with the Whirlybird on the Moon Knight table.
Complete the Final Mission and defeat the evil deity amid the stellar cataclism on the Moon Knight table.
Complete all the Asgard missions on the Thor table!
Defeat the traitor Loki on the Thor table!
Make at least three rounds in a row on the jump ramp of the Ghost Rider table!
Beat all of the villains including the final boss on the Ghost Rider table!
Collect 3 heroes to help Xavier battle against Magneto.
Spell out X-MEN and bring Magneto to his knees.
Secure at least 500.000 points in Funding Hurry-up mode!
Make 10 coil ramp shots with one ball!
Lock one ball in the Nitro Tank!
Fully upgrade one of the parts!
Survive the Giant Boulder ramp!
Complete all Adventures!
Make a Super Combo!
Rule the tribe by summoning all of the natural disasters!
Win a Fight!
Defeat the evil crime boss!
Collect 30 Crystal Skulls!
Complete the last Chapter of the Story Mode.
Survive the wave of aliens and win the Invasion Multiball!
Collect all 10 medals!
Repel the attack of the robber knights against Camelot!

trophies.trophyName: A seat at the Round Table
trophies.trophyDetail: Play through to the end one of the tales of the Knights of the Round Table!
Using the Spaceship magnetic drain collect five space samples!
Neutralize the defense system of the Pyramid!
Lock at least one ball in the film reel and start a Multiball Phenomenon with the cube on the Paranormal table!
Get up to the attic of the Haunted Mansion and banish at least one ghost on the Paranormal table!
Score a 6-way combo!
Complete the final mission: Midnight Madness!

Loot as many items as you can to eventually find some Epic stuff with better stats. The whole set consists an epic weapon, shield, armor and helmet. You can keep those items after the game is over, so loosing a game does not mean that you have to start to collect the set from the beginning!

Travel through three areas: the Haunted Mill, the Forest and the Dungeon to encounter no less than 12 monsters! Defeat them all and shoot the Loot hole to begin the fight against the giant Random Dragon.
This trophy is for those who can defeat the mighty beast.
Lock three balls and start You Have Mail Multiball on the Plants vs. Zombies table.
Confront Dr. Zomboss and triumph over his giant Zombot on the Plants vs. Zombies table.
Set the sign of the Fantastic Four on fire with Human Torch on Fantastic Four.
Finish all the main missions and save the world on Fantastic Four.
Have at least 5 allies with either Iron Man or Captain America on the Civil War table.
Win a fight at Very Hard level: your opponent must have at least two more allies than you on the Civil War table.
Earn your first rank by completing the clone training on the Clone Wars table.
Purge the galaxy by defeating both Sith Lords on the Clone Wars table!
Make 10 jumps in a row over the Sarlacc pit on the Boba Fett table!
Travel through Wild Space to fight the Battle of Kamino on the Boba Fett table!

trophies.trophyName: So, you want to become a Jedi?
trophies.trophyDetail: Complete a Training mode on the Star Wars Episode V table.
Uncover the dark secret of Darth Vader at the end of Scene 6 on the Star Wars Episode V table.
Score a Dark Side award on the Star Wars: Episode VI table.
Start the Death Star multiball for the first time on the Star Wars: Episode VI table.
Complete a round in the Lone Fighter Mission on the Star Wars: Starfighter Assault table.
Collect 100 Commendations for your pilot with one ball on the Star Wars: Starfighter Assault table.
Question 3 rebel officers in the Force mode on the Star Wars: Darth Vader table.
Waste 5 X-wings in the Trench Run mode on the Star Wars: Darth Vader table.
Score a Golden Goal by starting the Wizard Mode and shooting a Super Jackpot into the goal on a Super League Football table.
Score 10 goals in a single match to be awarded with a Golden Boot on a Super League Football table.
Defeat the Eye Of Agamotto mini playfield on the Doctor Strange table!
Start the Shuma-Gorath Multiball on the Doctor Strange table!
Finish a perfect Tusken Raider mode on Star Wars™ Pinball: Episode IV A New Hope table.

trophies.trophyName: It's too big to be a space station
trophies.trophyDetail: Initiate a Yavin multiball on Star Wars™ Pinball: Episode IV A New Hope table.
Get C-3PO out his unfortunate predicament by completing the Fix C-3PO mode on the Star Wars™ Pinball: Droids™ table.
Max out WED-15's Wizard Mode Time Perk by completing the hurry ups at his lane on the Star Wars™ Pinball: Droids™ table.
Shoot two balls subsequently into the space slug on the Star Wars™ Pinball: Han Solo table.

trophies.trophyName: The best smuggler in the business
trophies.trophyDetail: Hit the right secret compartment 3 times in a row on the Star Wars™ Pinball: Han Solo table.
Make a double skill shot from the manual plunger on the Star Wars™ Pinball: Masters of the Force table!

trophies.trophyName: No more training do you require
trophies.trophyDetail: Make combo shots and reach a Master Combo on the Masters of the Force table!
Start a Weasel or a Blind Al mode with a locked ball in The Box on the Deadpool table.
Gather at least 15 combo counters at once on the Deadpool table.
Complete a main mode to start Orb Bonus on the Guardians of the Galaxy table.
Start the Collector Multiball on the Guardians of the Galaxy table.
High five Duck in Long Road Ahead on The Walking Dead table.
Complete Scout Ahead while avoiding the zombie ball on The Walking Dead table.
Activate Butters' Outfit mode and collect a new outfit on the South Park: Butters' Very Own Pinball Game.
Activate the Bikers Multiball on the South Park: Butters' Very Own Pinball Game.
Activate the Windy Bumpers on the South Park’s Super-Sweet Pinball.
Activate the Mr. Hankey multiball on the South Park’s Super-Sweet Pinball.
Launch a probe and get it to the right spot on Secrets of the Deep!
Explore the shipwreck completely on Secrets of the Deep!
Complete two successful shots against the galleon during Mock Warfare on Rome!
Seize control over the garrisons at least seven times or start FRENZY on Rome.
Amass your first million with the Mad Professor watching on Biolab.
Breach quarantine after completing all missions and escape on Biolab.
Hit all of the guardians of the hidden mini-playfield on Pasha!
Open the book and complete all tales on Pasha.
Start a battle and help Spidey to weaken the symbiote on the Venom table.
Complete all main modes and win in Maximum Carnage on the Venom table.
Defeat 50 incoming berserkers on the CastleStorm table.
Win a quick-draw duel on the Wild West Rampage table.
Duel with the Inquisitor on the Star Wars™ Pinball: Star Wars Rebels™ table.
Use up both kickbacks in one activation on the Marvel's Avengers: Age of Ultron table. (Single player only)
Complete all 6 Test Chambers and then defeat GLaDOS on the Portal ® table. (Single player only)
Shoot at least 5 times at Ant-Man during Sparring on the Ant-Man table! (Single player only)
Knock out Avery Bullock on the American Dad! Pinball table. (Single player only)
Spend 100,000 bucks from the Operations Fund in the Archer Pinball table. (Single player only)
Serve all customers to get to the Wizard Mode on the Bob's Burgers Pinball table. (Single player only)
Start the Giggity Multiball on the Family Guy Pinball. (Single player only)

trophies.trophyName: The dark side and the light
trophies.trophyDetail: Defeat Kylo Ren in his side mode on the Star Wars™: The Force Awakens™ table. (single player only)
Lock a ball in the TIE fighter dock of the Might of the First Order table! (Single player only)
Defeat both Facehuggers in the Ulterior Motives game mode on Aliens Pinball. (Single player only)
Perform 20 Stealth Takedowns on the Alien: Isolation Pinball table. (Single player only)
Rank up on Alien vs. Predator Pinball. (Single player only)

trophies.trophyName: A Force To Be Reckoned With
trophies.trophyDetail: Locate all A‑Force members to aid you on the A‑Force table. (Single player only)
Get Bombshell in play with her ramp on Marvel’s Women of Power: Champions. (Single player only)
Reach level five on the Fallout® Pinball table. (Single player only)
Blast away your enemies with the BFG on DOOM® Pinball. (Single player only)
Defeat a dragon on The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim® Pinball table! (Single player only)
Complete Krennic's Wrath on level 2 on Star Wars™ Pinball: Rogue One™ table! (Single player only)
